item.title: The Power of Variable Names
About Me
item.description: 📚 I love phylosophy. 🧑‍💻 I’m presistent in software development. 🏷 I create value from content and design. 💻 People come to me for tech support. … Still figuring out the intersection. Check out my Linktree to know me more! No bullshit quote. Just be clear about what we want need. ✌️
